article.title: Online order
article.label: Order
article.intro: Give us your requirements and get a ROM Estimate for your project, today

text.p: Contact us to get a quotation for your software project. The process is simple:

ol.li: One of our Project Managers gets back to you
We solicit your requirements ([Informal Request]({% href process/scope/specification %}))
You confirm that the Vision covers the whole [scope]({% href process/scope %})
We estimate the project, you get [ROM Estimate]({% href process/cost/rom %})
We give you [Schedule]({% href process/time/schedule %}), and Staffing estimates
You make a first payment ([Retainer]({% href process/cost/model %}))
We start the Project and finish it [in time]({% href process/time %}), according to the [SRS]({% href process/scope/srs %})

text.p: Start with [online contact form]({% href contacts %}).
